subtitle: Nutty pancakes filled with a creamy mushroom filling.

method.text: First make the batter. Mix together the flours in a large bowl and make a well in the centre. Beat together the milk and egg. Gradually beat into the flour to make a smooth batter.

Heat a little oil in a frying pan. When hot, pour in a small amount of batter. Tilt the pan so the batter spreads evenly. Cook until the underside is golden. Turn the pancake over and cook the second side. Repeat to make all pancakes (allowing 2 per person) and keep warm.
Melt the butter in a pan, add the mushrooms and saute for 3-4 min. Stir in the flour and gradually add the milk and single cream. Bring to the boil, stirring continuously.
Season to taste. Stir in the salad onions, half the cheese and the prawns.
Fold each pancake in half. Spoon the filling on to the pancakes and roll into cornets.
Place on a greased baking sheet, cover with greased foil and bake for 10 min. Uncover, sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake for 5-10 min until the cheese has melted..

title: Buckwheat and prawn cornets
